ee baththaramulla - parlimenthu kridanganaye pihiti ranawiru smarakaya abhiyasa ada (19) pawathi jathika ranawiru samarum uthsawaya amathamin.ehidi janadhipathiwaraya thawaduratath kiya sitiye el.ti.ti.ee hithawadinge balaporoththu itu kirimata thaman kisiwitekath ida nothabana bawayi.janadhipathiwarayage pradhanathwayen pawathi jathika ranawiru samarum uthsawayata kathanayakawaraya, thriwidha hamudapathiwarun athulu aaradhithayan menma rata wenuwen diwipidu ranawiruwange gnyathin da ekwa sitiya.janadhipathiwarayage samprapthiyen pasu jathika giya gayana kerunu athara, anathuruwayi uthsawa sabhawe wada katayuthu aarambha wune.

eksath jathinge kriyakari kandayama shri lankawata paminima sidu wenne, athurudan wuwange pawul saha manawa himikam kriyakarin wisin wasara gananawak thisse; balahathkarayen athurudan kirimata erehi antharjathika sammuthiya sammatha kirimatath, shri lankawa thula athurudan kirim saparadhi kriya ganayata athulath kirimatath, marana sahathika wenuwata athurudahan wu bawata sahathika nikuth kirimatath, kala illim itu kirimata rajaya wisin kamaththa pala kara masa dekak athulathayi.

yakkala kirindiwala mawathedi wan rathayaka gati pare gamangath pudgalayin thidenekuta thuwala siduwima siddhiye wan ratha riyaduruta rupiyal dahasaka mudal apayakda, rupiyal haththapan dahasaka (75000/-) pudgala apayakda gampaha athireka mahesthrath hesantha da mel mahatha 19 dina niyama kaleya.anathurin thuwalalath ek ayekuta rupiyal 35000/- this pandahasaka sanukampitha dimanawakda, sulu thuwalalath thawath ayekuta rupiyal 5000/- pandahasaka dimanawakda gewana lesatada niyoga kaleya.chuditha wanratha riyaduru wenuwen adhikaranayata karunu dakwu nithignyawaraya pawasuwe hadisiyema wanrathaye ek rodayaka hulanyama nisa palanaya kara gatha nohakiwa anapekshikawa anathura wu bawaya.

namuth mahinda chinthanaya yatathe methek laba dena lada sahaya ha aadhara upakara mathin aranayaka nawodayak udakara denna thamanta hakiyawa labunu bawa da, ehidi rajayen wenkaranu labana mudal prathipadanayan mangin idikerena pawul saukhya sewa madhyasthana thulin nirogi saukhya sampanna daru pirisak ha nirogi mawupiya paramparawak da idiriye ratata dayada karana bawa da pawasiya.mehidi adahas dakwu sabhapathi dinesh gunarathna mahatha adahas dakwamin, rajaya wehesa dara wishala mudal pramanayak wayakara saukhya sewawan diyunu karannata ganna piyawaragena thibena bawath, pradeshiya sabhawa janatha sewawan wadath kramawathwa labadennata saukhya sewa sapayana niladhari piris da piyawara gatha yuthu bawa da pawasiya..

paryeshana sandaha mahajana mudal waya kirima diyunu wana ratakata kala haki pa්rashastha aayojanayak bawath, niwaradi pa්rathipaththi ramuwak thula, chinthanaye nidahasa paryeshakayanta laba demin owunta yam maga penwim kirima ohuge ka්ramawedaya wuna.
jathyanthara mulya ganudenu waladi karyakshamathawaya wadi kirima sandaha mema thiranaya gath bawa shri lanka maha bankuwa pawasayi.
